about_the_game:
Swords of Edo is a series of comic 'kinetic' visual novel stories.

Stories Included


Swords of Edo Issue 1
This first issue introduces the different members of the Justicars who serve Edo to protect the people from threats both externally and from within. Female Samurai warriors who will do whatever they need to, to protect the land.


Swords of Edo Issue 2
After the events of issue 1 Edo is in turmoil, when an unknown Ronin begins cutting a bloody swathe through the greatest city in Edo. Will he destroy Edo or can the Justicars prevent his dark purpose.


Swords of Edo Issue 3
The final part of the comic series, where the fate of Edo will be decided once and for all as two factions fight to take control of Edo once and for all.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes graphic violence as well as implied sexual interactions and forced sexual practices involving violence. All characters depicted are over the age of 18 but some scenes may be distressing to view. There are some scenes of women in underwear and partially undressed as well.

short_description: Swords of Edo is a series of comic 'kinetic' visual novel stories... Featuring a sexy artstyle following a group of Female Warriors as they face off against various threats to the land and people of Edo. A modern what if story about female Samurai.
